attributes.action: Stop the violent duck/goose down industry
attributes.additional_details:
Down is used for our comfort however it's a stark contrast for the unfortunate birds trapped in the down industry.
Birds are often plucked alive, ripping open their skin causing them distress and immense pain. Birds from the frois gras industry are also sold for their feathers.
Please sign and help raise awareness of this horrific industry.

Read more here on PETA: http://www.peta.org/features/investigation/
